100.description: Do not use for UI elements or text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 1.45:1 against background #ffffff

200.description: Do not use for UI elements or text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 1.96:1 against background #ffffff

300.description: Do not use for UI elements or text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 2.71:1 against background #ffffff

400.description: Color can be used for UI elements or large text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 3.84:1 against background #ffffff

500.description: Color can be used for small text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 5.57:1 against background #ffffff

600.description: Color can be used for small text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 8.19:1 against background #ffffff

700.description: Color can be used for small text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 11.9:1 against background #ffffff
